title: An Airplane trip: an instructional sound film
brief_description: An instructional film of a plane trip. Dorothy and her mother travel from Los Angeles to salt Lake City. Shows and explains the duties involved in maintaining and servicing such a trip through the mechanics, stewardesses, and pilots and also includes the panoramic views as seen through the eyes of the passengers.
